title: graphic design
job_overview: I have a short e-book that I am using for my lead magnet.   I need some illustrations to go along with the body based on the content of the e-book.   Also a cover for the e-book, again based on the content.  And a logo for my business, the e-book contains a general description of what my business is.  If this works out, I will need some help designing my website and Facebook page.
